title: LaunchIntel Input Schemas
description: Defines the expected inputs for each LaunchIntel command.

launch.description: No user input required. Fetches upcoming launches automatically.

recent.description: Fetch recent launches within a look-back window.

days.description: Number of days to look back for recent launches.

spacestocks.description: Fetch stock prices. Symbols are configured via config or STOCK_SYMBOLS env var.

symbols.description: Optional override: array of ticker symbols to query.

spacenews.description: No user input required. Fetches latest space news automatically.

launch_canvas.description: No user input required. Generates a visual countdown HTML page.

alerts.description: No user input required. Checks launches and fires timed alerts.
